mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name,#{preViewRealPath}+ file_path AS file_path,deleted FROM t_file WHERE deleted ='0' AND id IN ( SELECT SUBSTRING(a.audit_file_id,number,CHARINDEX(',',a.audit_file_id+',',number)-number) as audit_file_id from (SELECT audit_file_id FROM t_w_end_paper WHERE id = #{id} ) a,master..spt_values where number >= 1 and number < len(a.audit_file_id) and type='p' and SUBSTRING(','+a.audit_file_id,number,1)=',' )

SELECT id, file_name,#{preViewRealPath}+ file_path AS file_path,deleted FROM t_file WHERE deleted ='0' AND id IN ( SELECT SUBSTRING(a.water_proof_file_id,number,CHARINDEX(',',a.water_proof_file_id+',',number)-number) as water_proof_file_id from (SELECT water_proof_file_id FROM t_w_end_paper WHERE id = #{id} ) a,master..spt_values where number >= 1 and number < len(a.water_proof_file_id) and type='p' and SUBSTRING(','+a.water_proof_file_id,number,1)=',' )

SELECT id, file_name,#{preViewRealPath}+ file_path AS file_path,deleted FROM t_file WHERE deleted ='0' AND id IN ( SELECT SUBSTRING(a.other_file_id,number,CHARINDEX(',',a.other_file_id+',',number)-number) as other_file_id from (SELECT other_file_id FROM t_w_end_paper WHERE id = #{id} ) a,master..spt_values where number >= 1 and number < len(a.other_file_id) and type='p' and SUBSTRING(','+a.other_file_id,number,1)=',' )
SELECT *,#{preViewRealPath} AS preViewRealPath FROM t_w_end_paper WHERE rescinded ='0'

SELECT t1.id as id,t1.unit_code AS unitCode,t1.unit_name AS unitName,
t2.mobile_number AS mobileNumber,t2.contacts AS receiverName FROM (SELECT id,use_water_unit_id,unit_code,unit_name
FROM t_w_end_paper )t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT id, MAX(create_time) AScreate_time FROM t_w_end_paper WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode}
AND audit_status ='1' AND confirmed = '0' AND rescinded = '0' AND SUBSTRING(unit_code,5,2) IN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT 'NO_THIS_CODE' AS unit_type_code ) and unit_code like '%${unitCode}%' GROUP BY id )ta ON t1.id =ta.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts )t2 ON t1.use_water_unit_id =t2.use_water_unit_id
